name: Puffer Pop
description:
In the puzzle game Puffer Pop, you leverage your environment to dodge sharks, eat crabs, and rearrange bubbles. To survive the sharks, you'll need to puff up and show your spikes. However, there is a catch—you need air bubbles to do that... and a bubble only inflates a single side...



To reach the bubbles, you'll have to buy time by forcing enemies to run into and around each other. To take our your predators, you'll have to lure them into your spike-y sides. Sometimes, you may even need to rearrange the level to your advantage.

Features

  • Relaxing turn-based gameplay with ocean ambiance
  • Small, self-contained levels for quick play sessions (once solved...)
  • 50 levels focusing on the strategies needed to conquer endless mode
  • Endless mode with saving for when you're on a roll
